ThingDef.label: jelly slime
ThingDef.description: Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.\n\nJelly slime production type, produces 400 Insect Jelly every 10 days.

ThingDef.label: ancient slime
ThingDef.description: Slimes - an amalgam life-form that was developed as an alternative source of necessary materials for Obsidia Expansion.\n\nAncient slime - an unconfigured without purpose, perhaps when butchery it, you will be able to find out secrets of Slimes creation.
